lead_paragraph: A 63-story luxury hotel in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, burst into flames on Thursday evening. Over a dozen people were reported to have been injured.

byline.contributor: Christine Hauser contributed reporting from New York.

headline.print_headline: Fire Engulfs Luxury Hotel in Dubai
headline.main: Fire Engulfs Luxury Dubai Hotel, Forcing Evacuation of New Year’s Crowd

snippet: A 63-story luxury hotel in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, burst into flames on Thursday evening. Over a dozen people were reported to have been injured.
abstract: Large crowd is evacuated from luxury hotel skyscraper Address Downtown Dubai after fire breaks out in building on New Year's Eve; government of Dubai officials say fire originated outside hotel, and internal safety systems stopped it from spreading.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Address Downtown Dubai (Dubai, United Arab Emirates, Hotel)
